title: Is it okay to post a replay video of a Challenger match I spectated?
body: I checked the ToS briefly and nothing jumped out at me, but it's not my gameplay, so I figured I'd ask here to see if it's commonplace or frowned upon.

replies.body:
There's nothing in the ToS against it, but...If you're posting the entire match and it's their stream or whatever, that's just a dick move. You're basically stealing their content.

Now, if you're just taking a clip of it, within reason, that's fine. Or if you're commentating on it, that's also fine.

Just don't post a shittier version of their own stream, and don't claim the match was yours.
